Title: test_check_fav_list
Description: Verifies if the products are added to the favourite list
Steps: Find and click on the \"Favourites\" button from the navigation bar
Expected Result: The button is found and clicked

Steps: Checks for items in the favourite list
Expected Result: The product is present in the list

Title: test_add_to_favs
Description: Adds the products to the favourite list

Title: test_apply_filter
Description: Verifies the functionality of the product filters
Steps: Locate the filter options and click on them as required
Expected Result: Successfully clicks on filter, and products of only that brand show

Title: test_sign_in
Steps: Find and click the Sign In button on the Home page
Click the Username dropdown and select a username
Expected Result: The username is selected from the dropdown

Steps: Click the Password dropdown and select a username

Expected Result: Login successful, and the Home page is shown with \"log out\" option
